segments.text: In the kitchen, a woman stands by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's holding a plate and a towel, wiping it carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs, filling the basin to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water spills over, dripping down to the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy climbs a stool near the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He reaches into the open cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands beside him, arm extended upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She waits for a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above shows a neat garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, letting in light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack on the counter nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene captures a typical afternoon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the imbalance in the stool bothers me.
segments.speaker: PAR
